alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Jackson; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 5:44PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Jackson and northeastern Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida, western Gadsden and north central Liberty Counties in Big Bend of Florida through 615 PM EDT/515 PM CDT/... At 544 PM EDT/444 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles north of Blountstown, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Greensboro, Chattahoochee, Sneads, Grand Ridge, Altha, Rock Bluff, Ocheesee, Juniper, Selman, Rosedale, Union City, Chipola, Henderson Mill, Alliance, Blountstown Airport, Hardin Heights, Chason, Hardaway, Sink Creek and Willis. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
